page.title: 03Family life in Laggan
page.content: Families in Laggan work and play together.With no available public entertainment,old games are played at home ie cludo,monopoly,playing cards,darts.Most mothers who work arrange their hours to be at home for their children.No fathers work away from home.Outings are always family outings.Most homes have modern equipment ,but children are still encouraged to do tasks about the home and garden.The policy of early to bed and early to rise is applied in most homes.The main family meal is in the evening when all are present.T.V can intrude on this family occaision and ,indeed,T.V causes most arguments at home.
